content: दीप् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (दीप्यते, दीप्त; {%<ab>freq.</ab>%} देदीप्यते) {@--1@} To shine, blaze, (<ab>fig.</ab> also); सर्वैरुस्रैः समग्रैस्त्वमिव नृपगुणैर्दीप्यते सप्तसप्तिः <ls>M. 2. 13</ls>; तरुणीस्तन एव दीप्यते मणिहारावलिरामणीयकं <ls>N. 2. 44</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 2</ls>, <ls>R. 14. 64</ls>; <ls>H. Pr. 46.</ls> {@--2@} To burn, be lighted; यथा यथा चेयं चपला दीप्यते <ls>K. 105.</ls> {@--3@} To glow, be inflamed or excited, increase (<ab>fig.</ab> also); <ls>R. 5. 47</ls>; <ls>Bk. 15. 88</ls>, <ls>Śi. 20. 71.</ls> {@--4@} To be fired with anger; <ls>Ki. 3. 55.</ls> {@--5@} To be illustrious. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (दीपयति|ते) {@--1@} To kindle, set on fire, inflame. {@--2@} To illuminate, light, irradiate; वृंदावनांतरमदीपयदंशुजालैः (इंदुः) <ls>Gīt. 7</ls>; <ls>U. 1. 42.</ls> {@--3@} To excite, raise. {@--4@} To adorn, grace; <ls>Ki. 10. 1.</ls>
